news_header: Two Turkish businessmen criticized the regime, facing investigations and travel bans as a result.
news_original_title: Liikemiehet kritisoivat Turkin hallintoa – seurauksena kuulustelut ja matkustuskielto
news_text: Two Turkish businessmen, Omer Aras and Orhan Turan, criticized the undemocratic nature of the Turkish regime, leading to investigations against them. The government accused them of attempting to influence a fair trial and disseminating misleading information. Following their criticism, they faced police questioning and were later released but banned from travel.
